AirFireModeling 0.1.5

Reference

All functions

AirFireModelingEnv

Utilities for working with USFS AirFire BlueSky model output

ModelDataDir

Directory for Modeling Data

bluesky_aggregate()

Aggregate multiple BlueSky model runs into a single bs_grid object

bluesky_availiableModels()

Find coordinates appropriate model

bluesky_download()

Download BlueSky model data from AirFire

bluesky_load()

Load BlueSky NetCDF file and return contents as a bs_grid.

bluesky_toV2()

Convert BlueSky NetCDF output to modernized NetCDF

getModelDataDir()

Get Package Data Directory

gridPlot_spaghetti()

Create a Spaghetti Plot From ws_monitor Data

grid_correlationMap()

Correlation Map

grid_createMonitor()

Collapse a bs_grid object into a ws_monitor object with a single monitor

grid_distance()

Create distance-from-targetgGrid

grid_ggmap()

Map gridded model data with ggplot2

grid_isGrid()

Test for correct structure in a bs_grid object

grid_map()

Map gridded model data

grid_subset()

Subset bs_grid to create a smaller grid

grid_subsetByDistance()

Subset a bs_grid object by distance from a location

grid_subsetByHUC()

Subset a bs_grid objectt by hydrologic unit code

grid_subsetByMask()

Subset a bs_grid with with a gridMask

grid_timeseriesPlot()

Timeseries Plot for a `bs_grid` Object

modelBoundingBox()

Find bs_grid model bouding box

modelDomains()

Internal function for model domain info

modelInfo()

Model information

monitor_forecastPlot()

Compare forecasts

monitor_ggforecastPlot()

Compare forecasts

setModelDataDir()

Set Package Data Directory
